title: Surrender @ 10 if afk's?
body: what do you guys think of this...if a player doesn't connect from the start of the match and stays dc'd for 10 minutes you should be able to surrender@10 minutes... if a player comes back before then its really easy to catch back up... but otherwise chances are that the dc'er isnt coming back(and even if they do it will be hard to catch back up)... or at least put this in for unranked games

replies.body: This would be good... if it weren't going to be exploited by premades, trolls, and afk-bots.
Everything can be exploited, punish the people who do so.
Problem: No way to prove the person is actually exploiting it or if they might just be having Bugsplats. Too much chance of false-positives.

> [{quoted}](name=Yousosmart,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2EEbEu5A,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-03-28T20:54:29.429+0000)
>
> Problem: No way to prove the person is actually exploiting it or if they might just be having Bugsplats. Too much chance of false-positives.

You can't "exploit" this. You would be punished for not connecting.

It's funny how people throw the it can be exploited excuse when there is nothing to exploit. This just allows teams starting as a 4v5 to end the game at 10 minutes instead of waiting until 20 minutes, that afker receives a punishment whether the game ends at 10 or 20. So, the only difference is the team of 4 saves 10 minutes and the painful experience of waiting that extra 10 minutes.
Once our team stomped so hard that the enemy jungler ragequited and we won at 15 minutes. Give them no chance to surrender!

Maybe only do this when the afk number is 2 and above.

4v5 is just as bad and you still have the option to say no, its just 1 team feels it especially hard while the other usually trolls or trash talk half the time.
especially when you then have a toxic player on your team >.> or that one guy that refuses to accept the  surrender
You should be able to surrender at 10 no matter what. Some games are just no fun.
This is pretty necessary for ARAM, regardless if anyone is AFK or not.
This would be perfect for ARAM.
I think 20 is good personally even with afk.
Makes you crazy.
Lol well its just my opinion.

While it's true that most of the early game isn't really affected by the afk, especially if it's the jungler, by the 15th minute roaming usually starts and being outnumbered becomes a more and more serious issue.
Still believe 20 is a good time to evaluate wether to surrender or not.
20 mins of a lopsided game is unfair, no fun, and too long.  We need a solution!

I think 10 min might be a little short, maybe 15 or 12? 

definitely 20 for aram is too long though.

Had a game where my team lost despite the enemy having a dc/afk. Thier Vayne hadn't been there all game, but their jungle was so good, he carried bot, got his jungle buffs, ganked other lanes, and got so fed that my team ended up surrendering. If they had been able to surrender at 10 minutes, they would have missed out on a win because that early, it was rough for them and they would have done so.
or just have every one afk and let team push and win before surrender? if u really think u gonna lose that bad.
If 3 people afk the game should automatically cut of after 3 to 5 minutes. If they want to practice last hitting til the end that's fine with me.

I wrote this a while ago and got no traction. I think most people like the pile of shit League is right now. Any ideas to create a system to fix something is met with the tired argument of "it's not the panacea of all league woes so it is 0% effective" **or** "that system can be abused and their couldn't possibly be a way a room full of smart programmers could compensate for shenanigans with x algorithm, SO it is zero percent effective."

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/summoners-rift/sAPEE7RV-mercy-rules-and-killers-game-mode

God yes, give us a way to end matches early that our obviously screwed up.  10 minute for afks.. give a 5 minute with no penalties to anybody for really screwed up situations.  Right now the biggest anti fun mechanic in this game is being force to play for 20 minutes when half your team doesn't even log in.
Should have been implemented ages ago, but because this has nothing to do with LCS it's low priority for riot.
people still wont surrender.  too much video game courage or something.  some people just wont surrender just no matter what.  perhaps they are punishing their teammates for losing the game.
I approve and how about LOSS PREVENTION along with it? Dota2 has something similar, why not us??
